title: The Genesis Collection
description: The Fashion3 genesis collection. This collection pays homage to the metaverses futuristic vibes. Iridescent colorways and shiny fabrics, a true celebration of technology and craftsmanship; two distinctly different worlds coming together for a grand entrance. Proceeds from this collection will be used to help bootstrap our fashion house further, as a gesture of gratitude the genesis collection holders will enjoy exclusive perks.

title: Secret Collection
description: Sports casual meets diesel. This clothing collection is for those who love Secret Network. All the new outfits that compose this collection are made from high quality Cotton and vegan-friendly polyester. Details and information regarding the clothing are printed and presented on the lothing article since we have nothing to hideâ€¦right?
